resources.string: Click here to sell your book at great prises

Our Vision

 Build a platform to enable students to work with ease, eliminate stress and meet their expectations


Our Promise

 We deliver top quality books, simple and convenient services at best prices to our community of smart hardworking and passionate students
 
 Our Mission

 To ensure that every Student is made available to the resources required to achieve their goals, fulfill their wishes and make history.

Do justice to your old books.
 Make it worth by Selling them at reasonable prices.

-Head to the sell page, pick the corresponding branch and year.

 -Go through the books and select the book of your choice. 

 -Upload a picture and verify the price. Once we verify the upload, the book will be put on our wait list to be sold.
